title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 419/93 of 25 February 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 685/69 on detailed rules of application for intervention of the market in butter and cream
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 419/93 of 25 February 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 685/69 on detailed rules of application for intervention on the market in butter and cream
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 24 (3) (c) of Regulation (EEC) No 685/69, '92 %' is hereby replaced by '91 %'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply to contracts concluded after its entry into force.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 February 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 215, 30. 7. 1992, p. 64.
(3) OJ No L 90, 15. 4. 1969, p. 12.
(4) OJ No L 336, 20. 11. 1992, p. 19.
(5) OJ No L 146, 6. 6. 1987, p. 27.
(6) OJ No L 364, 12. 12. 1992, p. 47.
